<<<<<<< HEAD
Sermons of the Right Reuerend Father in God Miles Smith, late Lord Bishop of Glocester. Transcribed out of his originall manuscripts, and now published for the common good Sermons Smith, Miles, d. 1624. Prior, Thomas, b. 1585 or 6.
[14], 287, [3], 289-305, [1] p.
Printed by Elizabeth Allde for Robert Allot, dwelling at the Blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1632.
"A sermon at the funerall of the Right Reuerend Father in God, Miles, late Lord Bishop of Gloucester .. by Thomas Prior" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous. Reproduction of the original in the British Library. Some print faded and show-through; some leaves stained.
=======

Printed by Elizabeth Allde for Robert Allot, dwelling at the Blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1632.
"A sermon at the funerall of the Right Reuerend Father in God, Miles, late Lord Bishop of Gloucester .. by Thomas Prior" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous. Reproduction of the original in the British Library. Some print faded and show-through; some leaves stained.
